mapper.update: update blog_info_tbl set title = #{title}, profile = #{profile}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, google_analytics = #{googleAnalytics} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select user_tbl_id from block_tbl order by id asc

select (select count(*) from post_tbl p where p.category_tbl_id = c.id) as postCount , (select count(*) from category_tbl where category_tbl_ref_id = c.id) as refCount , c.id, c.category_tbl_ref_id, c.subject, c.depth, c.pos, c.type , c.visible, c.fold, c.count_visible, c.list_visible, c.list_count, c.created_at from category_tbl c order by pos asc;
mapper.update: update category_tbl set subject = #{subject}, type = #{type}, visible = #{visible}, count_visible = #{countVisible} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, subject from category_tbl where `type` & 8 > 0
